metadata.title: Pop Threads La Rosa Rose Loteria Card Mexican Bingo Tee Shirt for Women
features: Made in the USA and Imported
Officially licensed Don Clemente Loteria Mexicana original artwork.
women men kids baby onesie toddler classic

Women's short sleeve tshirts are made with a premium blend of soft 65% polyester and 35% ring-spun USA cotton. These tees also feature reinforced double needle sleeves and bottom hem for comfort and durability. Printed shirts are available in a wide range of colors from basics to brights to heathers - pick your favorite! Note: All casual tshirts for women are a fitted style and do run small. Be sure to reference the size chart image for these clothes to find the best fit.

Quality Inks - All the inks we use are Oeko-Tex certified which means they are thoroughly tested for an harmful chemicals. The testing includes regulated and non-regulated substances and the standards usually exceed national limits.
description: Premium item is designed and printed with pride in the USA! Our designs are printed with a slight distressed look for styling.
